::Spears::

She followed Prebon, still carrying her spear in hand.
"Yes Master Prebon, as you command."  She walked with him,"Master, 
Forgive me.  I don't mind him threatening me, but I can't allow him 
to show you any disrespect. You are our master and should be held in 
the highest reguard."  She looked down," If you see fit to punish me 
master, I shall take what ever you feel is needed to right the wrongs 
of my actions."  She looked at Prebon and lowered the spear tip 
towards the floor. 



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, minime_316@h... wrote:
> (k, cya tomorrow Logo. And I'm glad to know someone likes Tazz, 
> Soulstice. Who do you think hit Stone Cold? It thinks it's either 
> Billy Gunn, Tazz or Test.)
> 
> Vulois
> 
> Vulois' temper was getting to hot. Convix tried to calm him down.
> 
> Control! You must control!
> 
> But they are destroying peace!
> 
> You can't kill them. Not yet atleast. But make the pain surge in 
> them. Remember, when a bot tried to attack the Embassy. You fed the 
> pain into his circuts of a death on Cybertron. Do it to all of them.
> 
> All of them?
> 
> Yes. I can help you.
> 
> All right.
> 
> Vulois focused, using his energy to make a psycic link between him 
> and the minds of his enemies. He tapped into the part of their body 
> that registered pain. He messed with it, putting on the max right 
> before death. He gave them an image with it. Everyone on Cybertron 
> living peacefuly, as techno-organic creatures. Except for them. 
They 
> would burn in the Pitt forever, always experiencing torture.
> 
> "Feel the pain that stands in th way of peace!"
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Trainers
> 
> As he walked ot the cargo room, Prebon answered Slayer's question.
> 
> "Who is she? Wouldn't you like to know. But no more speaking of the 
> past. It's an order."
> 
> But than, at the cargo room, he saw the hatred that was building 
> between them. And then he realized it: Slayer isn't only different 
> than Striker, he is the exact opposite. He loves what Striker 
hates, 
> such as death and hatred. He hates what Striker loves: Spears. He 
had to stop this.
> 
> "Spears! Slayer! Enough! We are on this team together, and I will 
not 
> have this! If you have a problem with one another, you will deal 
with 
> it on your own time, and not through a way that would damage my top 
> two recruits. Now, Slayer, try the suit on. It's made from a dead 
> Maximal. Spears, come with me. We must talk."
> 
> Spears went just outside the cargo room.
